`OJS` line_chart from tutorial with `ojs_define()` and `R` table

```{ojs}
tableR = data
tableOjs = transpose(tableR)

tableOjs

yearlyChart = Plot.plot({
  marks: [
    Plot.line(tableOjs, 
      {x: "year", y: "max"}, 
      { stroke: "red" }
    )
  ]}
)
```
